E_CANNOT_FIND_MESSAGE.message: Cannot find message for "{{ messageIdentifier }}". Make sure the message exists and can be detected by static analysis, more on this on https://radonis.vercel.app/docs/compiler#static-analysis

E_MISSING_MANIFEST.message: Cannot get the Radonis manifest. Make sure the server provider was configured properly

E_CANNOT_USE_ON_CLIENT.message: The `{{ hookName }}()` hook cannot be used client-side
